com.radaee.pdf

Class Path

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radaee.pdf.Path

  • public class Path
extends java.lang.Object
    class for Path
    Author:
    louyongzhi
    See Also:
    Path path = new Path();
    path.MoveTo(0, 0);
    path.LineTo(10, 10);
    path.CurveTo(100, 0, 100, 100, 30, 70);
    path.ClosePath();
    int cnt = path.GetNodeCount();
    int cur = 0;
    float point[] = new float[2];
    while( cur < cnt )
    {
    path.GetNode(cur, point);
    cur++;
    }
    Page page = m_doc.GetPage(0);
    page.ObjsStart();
    Matrix mat = new Matrix( 1, 0, 0, -1, 0, m_doc.GetPageHeight(0) );
    page.AddAnnotGlyph(mat, path, 0xFF0000, true);
    page.Close();
    path.Destroy();

      • GetNode

        public int GetNode(int index,
          float[] pt)
        get each node
        Parameters:
        index - range [0, GetNodeCount() - 1]
        pt - output value: 2 elements coordinate point
        Returns:
        node type:
        0: move to
        1: line to
        3: curve to, index, index + 1, index + 2 are all data
        4: close operation
